function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for human-to-human contact during in-store shopping or pick-up","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission","Mitigation":"Adopting technology-mediated queueing systems and virtual pick-up options","Technologies":"Virtual queueing systems, pre-ordering apps, delivery robots","People":"Customers, employees, and shop staff","Owner":"Retailers, shop owners, and technology providers"},{"Description":"Reduced social interaction due to technology-mediated solutions","Impact":"Decreased customer satisfaction and lack of 'fun' in shopping experience","Mitigation":"Implementing socially oriented innovative technologies to boost interaction","Technologies":"Socially oriented innovative technologies","People":"Customers, employees, and shop staff","Owner":"Retailers, shop owners, and technology providers"},{"Description":"Reliance on technology for sales and interactions","Impact":"Vulnerability to technological failures or outages","Mitigation":"Investing in reliable and redundant technology systems, and providing training for employees","Technologies":"Reliable technology systems, redundancy measures","People":"Customers, employees, and shop staff","Owner":"Retailers, shop owners, and technology providers"}]}
